oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Presbyterian Church maintains the tie around the world, 1944
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Multi-fold brochure containing text, maps, and photographs issued by the Defense Service Council of the Presbyterian Church in the U.S., 1944. Brochure describes various activities of Presbyterian chaplains serving United States armed forces at home and abroad during World War II. Forms part of Churches Ephemera Subject Files. 1 brochure: col., 5 x 7 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: First Presbyterian Church (Nashville, Tenn.); Presbyterian Church in the U.S. Defense Service Council
World War, 1939-1945--Chaplains; Military chaplains--United States; Military life; Military history; Presbyterian Church--United States--Clergy; World War II; Religion
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Presbyterian Church in the U.S. Defense Service Council
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219
